name: UnderGround Source
description:
UnderGround Source is a labyrinth game, you're lost in a strange environment... escape from this fog and destroy the creature behind it... Maybe she can help you in a future episode, Soon....

Game developed alone by Nicolas BERANGER (NicolasBrg) in one week for the Epic Mega Jam 2019, combining studies and development. (Not much time to sleep...;)) )

MODELISATION
Nicolas BERANGER
